S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3279: Add logic for execution-time sorting of IN list values into DESCENDING order when required.
This is a follow-up patch to add an implementation of the adjustForSortElimination(RequiredRowOrdering) to IndexToBaseRowNode, which was missing from the previous commit (svn # 616126). This commit also adds more test cases to InListMultiProbeTest.java.
